ValidationRule.description: Kentucky SL policies require a Municipality Tax in State Fees (Other). Use (https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1MUsukSjilhUf6fkrGtD6djUhbR1_0enY89VCCRiGlMU/edit?usp=shar) to calculate.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Received', DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) > DATEVALUE("2022-06-23"), Opportunity__r.Account.ShippingState = "Kentucky", Surplus_Lines_Quote__c = True, State_Fees_Other__c = 0)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Kentucky SL policies require a Municipality Tax in State Fees (Other). The tax % varies by county & line of business, calculate using this spreadsheet. (https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1MUsukSjilhUf6fkrGtD6djUhbR1_0enY89VCCRiGlMU/edit?usp=shar)
